message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. For this remarkable opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $720,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive a significant discount while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of the product's worth. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a long-term partnership. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
